item.title: Jasprit Bumrah Goes Past Zaheer & Ishant's Tally To Take No. 2 Position In Elite List Led By Kapil Dev - News18
item.description:
Jasprit Bumrah Surpasses Zaheer and Ishant to Claim No. 2 Spot in Elite Five-Wicket Hauls List

Date: December 15, 2024 | Source: News18

Star Indian pacer Jasprit Bumrah achieved a milestone by surpassing both Zaheer Khan and Ishant Sharma, taking his 12th five-wicket haul in Test cricket during the ongoing Test series against Australia.

  • Bumrah dismissed five Australian batters for 72 runs in 25 overs.
  • His milestone came during the third Test match at The Gabba, Brisbane.
  • Bumrah's fifer is his 9th in the World Test Championship, equaling Pat Cummins' record.
  • He has 49 Test wickets in Australia, aiming to break Kapil Dev’s record of 51.
  • Currently, Bumrah is second in the list of most wickets in the WTC 2023-25 season with 62 wickets.
“This five-wicket haul helped Bumrah become the first Indian bowler to take eight fifers in SENA countries.”

Bumrah’s performance not only solidifies his stature in Indian cricket but also sets the stage for him to achieve further records in upcoming matches.

item.title: 7 magnesium-rich foods to ward off winter blues - The Times of India
item.description:
7 Magnesium-Rich Foods to Ward Off Winter Blues

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

Winter brings cheer for many, but for some, it can exacerbate Seasonal Affective Disorder (SAD), resulting in mood changes and depression. Diet plays an essential role in managing these symptoms, particularly magnesium intake.

Role of Magnesium

Magnesium is critical for mood regulation and serotonin production, helping to combat winter blues. Including magnesium-rich foods in your diet can enhance mental resilience.

Key Magnesium-Rich Foods

  • Avocados: 58 mg of magnesium (14% DV)
  • Pumpkin Seeds: Best source of magnesium; soak before consuming.
  • Spinach: A versatile green packed with magnesium benefits.
  • Black Beans: 120 mg of magnesium (29% DV); high in protein.
  • Okra: 57 mg of magnesium (14% DV); rich in vitamins.
  • Chickpeas: 78 mg of magnesium (19% DV); energy-boosting properties.
  • Tofu: 37 mg of magnesium (9% DV); versatile in many dishes.

Conclusion

Incorporating these magnesium-rich foods can help alleviate symptoms of SAD and improve mood during the winter months.

item.title: Bigg Boss Telugu 8 Grand Finale Live Updates: Nikhil is the winner of Nagarjuna’s show - The Indian Express
item.description:
Nikhil Wins Bigg Boss Telugu 8 Grand Finale

Date & Source: December 2024, Indian Express

The long-awaited finale of Bigg Boss Telugu 8 has concluded with Nikhil emerging as the winner after 100 days of competition, taking home a cash prize of Rs 55 lakhs.

  • Nikhil defeated opponents Gautham Krishna, Avinash, Prerana, and Nabeel Afridi to win the title.
  • This season introduced a unique Buddy challenge format where contestants participated in pairs.
  • Initially, there were seven pairs, with additional wildcard pairs introduced later in the competition.
  • The season began with a Zero Cash prize, compelling contestants to strategize and perform tasks to build the prize pool.
  • Celebrities participated in promotional activities throughout the season, featuring films like Saripodhaa Sanivaaram and Game Changer.
“The contestants gave it their all to ensure victory for their clan.”

This season's finale showcased the exciting twists and competitiveness that have made Bigg Boss a hit, leading to Nikhil's ultimate triumph.

item.title: ‘Change in foreign policy needed amid changing landscape', says Jaishankar - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Change in foreign policy needed amid changing landscape, says Jaishankar

Publication Date: Sunday, December 15, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

External Affairs Minister S. Jaishankar emphasized the need for a revised foreign policy to align with India’s aspirations for a developed nation, or 'Viksit Bharat', during a recent speech.

  • Jaishankar discussed the historical context of India's foreign policy shaped by the 'Nehru development model'.
  • He argued for adapting foreign policy to reflect contemporary global changes and technological advancements.
  • Jaishankar stressed that discussions on foreign policy should not be viewed as political attacks.
  • He called for a more ambitious stance for India on the global stage.
“If today our aspiration at home is to become a Viksit Bharat, surely there must be a foreign policy for Viksit Bharat.” – Subrahmanyam Jaishankar

In conclusion, Jaishankar's remarks highlight the necessity for India to modernize its foreign policy framework to better navigate an evolving international landscape.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 11: Allu Arjun-Rashmika Mandanna film inches close to ₹900 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Box Office Collection Day 11

Date: Dec 15, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna-starrer Pushpa 2: The Rule is shattering box office records in India, nearing a total collection of ₹900 crore despite recent controversies.

  • The film has raked in approximately ₹897 crore as of the 11th day.
  • On Day 11, it earned ₹72.15 crore net in India.
  • There was a significant increase in box office earnings, with Day 10 earning around ₹63.3 crore compared to ₹36.4 crore on Day 9.
  • The film registered a 59.88% occupancy rate in Telugu and impressive numbers across multiple languages, including Hindi (63.88%), Tamil (42.38%), and Kannada (37.54%).
“Despite the recent turmoil surrounding Allu Arjun, the film is continuing to gain momentum at the box office.”

Pushpa 2: The Rule is the sequel to the successful Pushpa: The Rise from 2021, directed by Sukumar, and it continues the story of Pushpa Raj as he leads a red sanders smuggling operation.

With its strong performance, the film is set for a potential continuation into a third installment, Pushpa 3: The Rampage.

item.title: Ex-CIA officer shares chilling theory behind ‘unsettling’ mystery drone sightings - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ex-CIA Officer Shares Chilling Theory Behind Mystery Drone Sightings

Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

A former CIA officer, Laura Ballman, shared a chilling theory regarding the recent surge in mystery drone sightings. During a Fox News Live interview, she urged federal authorities to explain the phenomenon, suggesting that these sightings could be part of a covert exercise authorized by the Biden administration.

  • The increase in drone sightings has triggered public concern.
  • Ballman hypothesizes that the sightings may relate to testing evasion or detection technology.
  • Federal officials have downplayed public fears, calling it an “overreaction.”
  • The FBI reported receiving 5,000 tips related to the sightings, with only a small number warranting investigation.
“If I were in a position to advise on this, I would say it’s time to become more transparent,” Ballman stated.

This incident highlights ongoing tensions around transparency and federal disclosure in response to public concern about unidentified aerial phenomena.

item.title: Tabla maestro Ustad Zakir Hussain passes away at 73 in the US - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Ustad Zakir Hussain in 'Serious Condition' in US, Tributes Pour In

Publication Date: Sunday

Source: Times of India

Renowned tabla player Ustad Zakir Hussain has been hospitalized in San Francisco in a serious condition, prompting worldwide prayers from his fans for his recovery.

  • Ustad Hussain is 73 years old and has garnered a massive following around the globe.
  • His hospitalization led to rumors of his passing, which were quickly dispelled by his nephew via social media.
  • Tributes have poured in from politicians, industrialists, and celebrities on social media platforms.
“We ask for prayers for my uncle’s health. Can you please remove this misinformation. He is in a serious condition.” - Ameer Aulia, nephew of Ustad Zakir Hussain

The news of Ustad Zakir Hussain's health has sparked an outpouring of love and support from fans and admirers worldwide, highlighting his significant impact on music and culture.

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Status: Shares finalisation date, time - Check online by PAN, application number - ET Now
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Status: Shares finalisation date, time - Check online by PAN, application number

Date: December 15, 2024 Source: ET Now

The Vishal Mega Mart IPO was open for subscription from December 11 to December 13, 2024, with significant investor interest. The allotment of shares is expected to be finalized by December 16, 2024.

  • The IPO has a total issue size of Rs 8,000 crore and a price range of Rs 74-78 per share.
  • Vishal Mega Mart raised Rs 2,400 crore from anchor investors prior to the offering.
  • The IPO consists entirely of an offer-for-sale from promoter Kedaara Capital-led Samayat Services LLP, with no new equity being issued.

The IPO received 80.75 times subscription from Qualified Institutional Buyers, 14.25 times from non-institutional investors, and 2.31 times from Retail Individual Investors.

The IPO must be watched closely as its listing date on BSE and NSE is set for December 18, 2024, marking an important milestone for the company's public market entry.

item.title: MobiKwik IPO: Know Latest GMP, Allotment, and Listing Dates - News18
item.description:
MobiKwik IPO: Know Latest GMP, Allotment, and Listing Dates

Last Updated: December 15, 2024, 16:35 IST

The much-anticipated initial public offering (IPO) of One MobiKwik Systems Ltd has concluded with impressive subscription numbers. With an allotment finalisation date of Monday, December 16, and the listing scheduled for Wednesday, December 18, here’s all you need to know.

  • MobiKwik's unlisted shares are trading at Rs 444 per share, which is Rs 165 or 59.14% higher than the upper price band of Rs 279.
  • The IPO was open for bidding from December 11 to December 13 and received a 125.69 times subscription.
  • The retail investor category subscribed 141.78 times, while non-institutional investors subscribed 114.7 times.
  • The Qualified Institutional Buyers (QIB) category had a subscription rate of 125.82 times.
  • The IPO allotment process will be finalised on December 16, with shares debuting on December 18.
  • The issue size consists entirely of fresh equity shares worth Rs 572 crore.
The MobiKwik IPO has garnered significant attention from market participants, signaling a strong debut.

Stay tuned for the listing on December 18 as MobiKwik makes its mark in the public market space.

item.title: ‘If Pranab Mukherjee was made PM, Manmohan Singh as President in 2012…’: Mani Shankar Aiyar in tell-all book - Hindustan Times
item.description:
‘If Pranab Mukherjee was made PM, Manmohan Singh as President in 2012…’: Mani Shankar Aiyar in tell-all book

Date: Dec 15, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

In his book ‘A Maverick in Politics’, senior Congress leader Mani Shankar Aiyar reflects on the state of governance during the UPA-II government, emphasizing the need for a strong leader in 2012.

  • Aiyar believes Pranab Mukherjee should have been made PM, while Manmohan Singh should have assumed the presidency.
  • He attributes governance failures during the UPA-II tenure to the health issues of Singh and Congress president Sonia Gandhi.
  • The handling of several crises, especially the 'India Against Corruption' movement, is criticized for being ineffective.
  • Aiyar suggests that Mukherjee's assumed leftist leanings could have concerned the business community.
“If this obvious step had been taken, we would not have gone into a paralysis of governance and thus opened the door to the worst excesses of Hindutva in the general elections of 2014.”

Aiyar’s analysis provides a poignant look at missed opportunities in Indian politics and governance during a critical period.

item.title: Ram Charan and Sukumar to launch Game Changer’s trailer in this US city - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan and Sukumar to Launch Game Changer’s Trailer in Dallas, USA

Published on Dec 15, 2024 9:01 pm IST

Tollywood star Ram Charan, along with filmmaker Sukumar, is set to unveil the trailer for the anticipated political drama, Game Changer, in Dallas, Texas, next week.

  • The film features a strong cast including Kiara Advani and is produced by Dil Raju.
  • Game Changer is scheduled for worldwide release on January 10, 2025, coinciding with the Sankranti festival.
  • This event marks the first Indian film to have a pre-release event in the USA.
  • Director Sukumar will be the chief guest at the trailer launch event.
  • The soundtrack, composed by Thaman, has already seen three successful song releases.
“Following this event, the hype and expectations for Game Changer will surely reach the next level.”

The trailer launch is expected to significantly elevate public anticipation for the film.

item.title: Life-changing day: Dharavi’s Simran Shaikh, daughter of a wireman, fetches Rs 1.90 crore bid at WPL auction - The Indian Express
item.description:
Dharavi’s Simran Shaikh Becomes Most Expensive Player at WPL Auction

Publication Date: [Insert Date] | Source: The Indian Express

Simran Shaikh, a resident of Dharavi, has made headlines after being bought by Gujarat Giants for Rs 1.90 crore at the Women’s Premier League auction in Bengaluru, marking a significant milestone in her cricket career.

  • Simran overcame societal pressures and discouragement to pursue cricket.
  • She expressed her gratitude towards her father for supporting her aspirations despite challenges.
  • Her price at the auction places her as the second-highest paid uncapped player in WPL history.
  • Simran aims to uplift her family’s living conditions with her earnings.
  • She hopes her success will inspire other cricketers from Dharavi.
“Today the same people have come to congratulate our family,” - Simran Shaikh

This remarkable achievement not only showcases Simran's talent but also highlights the potential of sports to change lives, especially in underprivileged communities.
